Karaoke Night - June 10

June 10, 2016
8pm-11pm
doors open at 7:30pm
$5 cover

Karaoke Fundraiser to support Apple Hill Playhouse!
Apple Hill will be hosting this event with the help of Glenn Smith of Glenndini Productions and Curtain Call. Glenndini will be hosting Karaoke up stairs and Curtain Call will be hosting a Photobooth with props downstairs. Wine and Beer will be available as well as other surprises at the event.
Come on out and support the "best little theatre in the country."
